DOC.criteria: Adults > 18 year age Planning outpatient surgical treatment SUI placement transobturator suburethral sling general anesthesia Pregnant nursing Allergy bupivacaine History drug/alcohol abuse Severe cardiovascular , hepatic , renal disease , neurological impairmentÂ° Longacting opioid within 3 day opioid use within 24 hour surgery Contraindication : acetaminophen oxycodone nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAID ) Administration investigational drug within 30 day study Chronic pain syndrome Daily NSAID/opioid use Patients concomitant procedure undergo general anesthesia Patients require concomitant anterior repair urethrocele repair exclude require dissection anterior vaginal wall .
